message: LinkedIn is an excellent tool for lawyers seeking new contacts and professional recognition! By encouraging conversation on popular topics, lawyers can increase their relevance while sharing reliable legal insights that paint them positively and increase their odds of garnering new referrals.

You’re invited to join attorney Andy Brownstein and LinkedIn trainer and marketing consultant Marc W. Halpert as they share their recommended LinkedIn strategies in a members-only presentation on Friday, October 6, 2023 at 3:00 p.m. ET./12:00 p.m. PT.
Reminder: You are registered for Professionalism in the Age of Social Media: Relevance, Reliability, and Referability on LinkedIn on Friday, October 6, 2023 at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

LinkedIn may just be the key to helping your practice grow, but we haven’t received your RSVP yet! Don’t miss your chance to get free insights from our guest speakers that just may be the catalyst for change in your law firm.

You’re invited to join attorney Andy Brownstein and LinkedIn trainer and marketing consultant Marc W. Halpert as they share their recommended LinkedIn strategies in a members-only presentation tomorrow, October 6, at 3:00 p.m. ET./12:00 p.m. PT.
bottomline: Save Your Seat Before It’s Too Late!
